```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# seed
set.seed(1993)

# Load required packages
if (!requireNamespace("pacman", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("pacman")
}

library("pacman")

# Define path and data
p_load(here, readr, tidyverse, dplyr, cmdstanr, posterior)

# Visualization
p_load(ggplot2, ggpubr, gghalves, ggrain, cowplot, scales, ggdist, ggthemes, ggblend, PupillometryR, magick,  kableExtra, webshot2, bayesplot)

# Load required functions
#source(here::here("Analysis","functions","effectsize_cohend.R"))
source(here::here("Analysis","functions","utils.R"))
source(here::here("STAN","scripts","reporting.R"))

```
